Thank you Scott for your help.

I nuked the Ant mish-mash I was using and set up a pure 1.5.1 installation.
However I still get the problem where JUnit unsuccessfully seeks to
instantiate a com.sun.xml.parser.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl.

The more I look at how Ant uses JUnit the more I believe this may be an Ant
issue. I'll take my crusade to that discussion list.

Thanks for your time.

Jeremy Mawson


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Stirling [mailto:scottstirling@...]
> Sent: Friday, 8 November 2002 2:42 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Unable to find DocumentBuilderFactory
> 
> 
> Parser.jar doesn't come with Ant 1.5.1.  Sounds like you have 
> some *old*
> XML parser stuff mixed in with Ant's newer jars.  I have the 
> default Ant
> libs, plus jaxp.jar and crimson.jar and that's it (no 
> jaxp.properties).
> I believe parser.jar is the Sun XML parser implementation 
> that predates
> crimson.
> 
> Scott Stirling
subject: RE: [junit] Unable to find DocumentBuilderFactory
